methods.returnsDescription: Object containing screen dimensions, scale factor, brightness, etc.

methods.returnsDescription: Stored value, or undefined if not exists

methods.name: containerPath
methods.returnsDescription: Local path of iCloud container, null if unavailable

methods.name: isDirectory
methods.description: Check if path is a directory

methods.returnsDescription: File content, or null on failure

methods.description: List protected directory using Root (Requires TrollStore)

methods.description: Copy protected file using Root (Requires TrollStore)

methods.description: Check path info using Root (Requires TrollStore)

methods.returnsDescription: Object containing R/W permissions, existence, and debugging info

methods.name: rootExists
methods.description: Check file existence using Root (Requires TrollStore)

methods.name: rootAvailable
methods.description: Check if Root Helper is available
